topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55aeab676368722139001d25#post_55aeab676368722139001d25
I know and I hate it!

Like don't get me wrong, I _respect_ these people, and especially for having this munch dedication for the characters they voice.

But goddamn there is just a moment in time you have to say "Ok, we need a new voice actor".

Like Goku is an Adult and yet he still sounds like a kid.

And King Kai, Oh god, King Kai sounds terrible.

Like legit King Kai on screen is clearly Screaming at Goku and yet he sounds like he's having a normal conversation inside of a Library.

Its literally like 

*CHARACTER ON SCREEN SCREAMING*

~Characters voice~
